Text:

why dosent anybody rise the quality score (its with a good quality)    ................................................any way thnks

@Nevar18 
1 - If every one did like you, It will be impossible to download torrents
2 - There are 2 bandwidths : Up and Down 
For your games you use the Down and for the sharing it uses the Up.
So sharing torrents won't disturb your games :)
